name: Stone Throne
description:
A small side-scroller tower defence game prototype made with Gamemaker.

Description

You are a chief of a small tribe. They choose you to protect the village. Now it about you and those stinky goblins that charges in. But maybe there will be several brave gals to help you — for a fine price.

Feedback

Please leave feedback if you like the game. If the game crached, please make a screenshot of a crash window so I could fix it. You could make a game better and motivate me to make a better project. Thank you in advance.

Credits

Art taken from http://kenney.nl.
